page.title: 20A walk in Bodenham village.
page.content: St Michael's church to Chapel Lane. Leaving the lych gate we walk up the cobbled path towards the primary school. Here, in the oldest part of the village,are well kept halftimbered houses. Walking on past the school to the Well we come to a T junction.Going right, we follow the road to the five footed bridge. On the right is the smithy.Here the houses are brick. The river Lugg flows brown beneath the hump of the bridge. Past fields, then Dunfield Road branches to the right. On our right is the Millbrook which joins the Lugg a little further on. Here is the new estate.We turn right down Brockington Road and walk past houses until we reach the green.At the cross road on the left is the surgery and on the right Siward James Close.We turn left, then right and walking past the shops come to Chapel Lane.
